sentence: We arrived at 40 on New years eve and by the time we checked in and went to the room and back to the lobby we were told that for NYE reservations were required to dinner for that night only and the only time available was at 50 or else we could wait for Oreganos to open at 930 for pizza which we did
Every time I turned the corner from the walkway past the restaurants into the lobby I felt like I was in another world
The 3rd was the bartender Jose right in the lobby area
They are across from the main entrance on the left
Get the rooms near the reception they have better signal
Two tables tennis courts for 4 people but only 3 rackets cross training equipment in the fitness room needed some maintenance oil
Elevator inoperable in one building
Most of the amenities were not given even though we made several attempts at the Club offices

This vacation was not cheap by DR standards and I found it annoying that we had to be wary of anything else they were selling either at reception the tours alley the shops or the guys peddling stuff on the beach as everything was grossly overpriced
We did not try the spa or the gym and the entertainment was fun but not rowdy
Excellent workout facilities as well
gym is very complete super friendly staff that make your experience incredible
We experienced sublime treatments in EPCs amazing spa and used the extremely well equipped gym
The resort is beautiful gorgeous landscaping a really majestic lobby pools that wrap around the whole property
The resort looked beautiful as we drove up to the front entrance
Beautiful gym tennis courts ping pong etc
This is a high touch facility with many repeat visitors
I visited the gym well equipped clean functional
The gym is very well equipped for a hotel gym and the evening entertainment was superb every night
The main hotel pools are excellent and provide swimming facilities for those wishing to take a dip
